Docs.param: The in which this receiver is running.
A object you can call on.
The appWidgetIds for which an update is needed. Note that this may be all of the AppWidget instances for this provider, or just a subset of them.
Docs.summary: Called in response to the and broadcasts when this AppWidget provider is being asked to provide for a set of AppWidgets.
